User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the MangaTrack application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity (same as Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: The email address of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

Manga.title: Manga
Manga.description: Represents a manga, manhwa, or webtoon title in a user's library.

id.description: Unique identifier for the manga entity. Can be from MAL, MangaDex, etc.

imageUrl.description: URL of the manga's cover image.

status.description: The reading status of the manga.

readChapters.description: The number of chapters the user has read.

genres.description: List of genres for the manga.

createdAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the manga was added to the library.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the library entry was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/library/{mangaId}.description: Stores the manga entries for a user's personal library. Path-based ownership ensures users can only access their own library.
